name: sweet-shop-management-system
description: Full-stack Sweet Shop Management System with React, Node.js, and MongoDB

scripts.install-all: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && npm start" "cd frontend && npm run build && npm run preview"
scripts.test: cd backend && npm test && cd ../frontend && npm test

author: Sujal
